channel.title: R Markdown on Simina blog
channel.description: Recent content in R Markdown on Simina blog

item.title: Everything in statistical modeling can be seen as a regression
item.description: Regression concepts connected to loss functions and conditional means and medians More about the OLS fit: Linear algebra and geometric interpretation T-tests, ANOVA, and all the rest: Hypothesis testing in linear models From weighted regression to generalized linear models Smoothing and regression Regression and machine learning This is of course a bit of an exaggeration! It also depends on the way things are emphasized in, for example, statistical graduate programs.
